title: Ted Danson Is in a ‘Good Place’ These Days
text:
“I do a lot of things that are for show,” says Ted Danson, who rose to fame playing Sam Malone, the charming, womanizing bartender on “Cheers.” That can mean, he says, “leaving a $20 tip for the barista, but making sure the barista sees me putting it in the jar so it’s not anonymous—it’s really for them to see what an incredible celebrity I am. If anything, I’m probably losing some points that way,” he concludes. “It’s a karmic wash.”

Mr. Danson, who at 71 is affable and unpretentious, seems to specialize in this sort of self-deprecation....
description: In NBC’s quirky comedy, the former star of ‘Cheers’ and ‘CSI’ relishes mixing moral philosophy with ‘9-year-old fart humor’
